title: New: Molly Beanland – Electric
content:
I’ll be damned if this isn’t one of the finest pop songs of the year thus far.

You may recognize the vocals of Molly Beanland, also of Cub Scout who have previously graced the CitR pages before, and as per, they’re as refined and delicately elegant as ever. Electric is an early 90’s pop throwback, with echoes of classic hits from better years gone by. For me, it’s a timely reminder, that yes, this is it; we’re young, lost and more beautiful than ever before.

With Skruncha-roo (Kyle Vento) on production duties, and a collaboration track between the two of them on the way shortly, these are truly exciting times for Beanland and Vento.

NB: Not actual artwork.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
